bs-smartlist-ve-smartlist-title: Title for VisualEditor inspector for bs:smartlist tag
bs-smartlist-ve-smartlistinspector-count: Label for attribute "count" input - number of results to show
bs-smartlist-ve-smartlistinspector-minor: Label for attribute "minor" input - if minor changes should be shown
bs-smartlist-ve-smartlistinspector-new: Label for attribute "new" input - boolean - show only new pages
bs-smartlist-ve-smartlistinspector-sort: Label for attribute "sort" input - what parameter should be used for sorting
bs-smartlist-ve-smartlistinspector-order: Label for attribute "order" input - sort order
bs-smartlist-ve-period-day-label:
Label for dropdown option for "period" attribute - one day
{{Identical|Day}}
bs-smartlist-ve-period-week-label:
Label for dropdown option for "period" attribute - one week
{{Identical|Woch}}
bs-smartlist-ve-period-month-label:
Label for dropdown option for "period" attribute - one month
{{Identical|Month}}
bs-smartlist-ve-sort-time-label:
Label for dropdown option for "sort" attribute - sort by time of creation/modification
{{Identical|Time}}
bs-smartlist-ve-sort-title-label:
Label for dropdown option for "sort" attribute - sort by title
{{Identical|Title}}
bs-smartlist-ve-newbies-title-label: Title for VisualEditor inspector for bs:newbies tag
bs-smartlist-ve-newbiesinspector-count: Label for attribute "count" input - number of results to show
bs-smartlist-ve-toplist-title: Title for VisualEditor inspector for bs:toplist tag. The tag shows a list of the most viewed articles in a category.
bs-smartlist-ve-toplistinspector-portlet: Label for attribute "portletperiod" input - numeric - number of days in the past to retrieve changes
bs-smartlist-ve-mode-recentchanges-label: Label for a select option in VisualEditor {{Identical|recentchanges}}
bs-smartlist-ve-mode-changesofweek-label: Label for a select option in VisualEditor
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-count-label: Label for input field to set number of shown results
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-ns-label: Label for input field to filter for namespaces
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-cat-label: Label for input field to filter for categories
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-catmode-label: Label for dropdown to select filter combination
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-period-label: Label for dropdown to select period option
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-heading-label: Label for input field to set section heading
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-trim-label: Label for input number field to set maximum character length for page titles
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-showtext-label: Label for checkbox to set option for show preview of page content
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-trimtext-label: Label for input number field to set maximum character length for page content
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-showns-label: Label for checkbox to show namespace prefix
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-meta-label: Label for checkbox to show meta information
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-target-label: Label for input field to select page which is base for what links here
bs-smartlist-ve-inspector-excludens-labe: Label for input field to exclude namespaces
